title: Aids Hiv
content:
Read more about [staying safe(external link)](https://www.burnettfoundation.org.nz/learn/staying-safe/ "Open external link"). 
  * Don't donate blood, plasma, semen, body organs or body tissues.
  * Don't share personal items (eg, toothbrushes, razors or sex toys) that may be contaminated with blood, semen or vaginal fluids.

####  Support 
[Body Positive NZ(external link)](https://www.bodypositive.org.nz/ "Open external link") is a peer support organisation for all people living with HIV in New Zealand  
[Toitu te Ao Inc(external link)](https://aucklandregion.communityhealthpathways.org/Resources/ToituteAoflyer.pdf) offers support, advocacy, information and education for Māori   
[Positive Women NZ(external link)](https://positivewomen.org.nz/ "Open external link") support organisation for women and families living with and affected by HIV  
[Burnett Foundation Aotearoa(external link)](https://www.burnettfoundation.org.nz/ "Open external link") provides information and support about sex, HIV and AIDS
